P006734.project_name: Medium Size Cities Water Supply Project

project_abstract.cdata: The Medium Size Cities Water Supply Project consists of seven sub-projects designed to increase water treatment and storage capacities and to improve water distribution. With the exception of sub-projects in Buenaventura and Santa Marta, sewerage works are also included.
